item.title: add freeflarum
item.description: https://freeflarum.com/) - Community powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove watermark from footer - Community powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove watermark from footer).

item.title: Added ipaddress.sh
item.description: https://about.ipaddress.sh/ - Simple service to get public IP address in different [formats](https://about.ipaddress.sh/).

item.title: Add ray.so
item.description: https://ray.so/ - Create beautiful images of your code snippets.

item.title: add mocky - simple http response mock generator
item.description: https://github.com/julien-lafont/Mocky - A simple web app to generate custom HTTP responses for mocking HTTP request. Also available as [open source](https://github.com/julien-lafont/Mocky).

item.title: add quicktype.io - typesafe code generator
item.description: https://quicktype.io/ - Quickly auto generate models/class/type/interface and serializers from JSON, schema, and GraphQL for working with data quickly & safely in any programming language. Convert JSON into gorgeous, typesafe code in any language.

item.title: fix localtunnel typo
item.description: https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel - Easily share a web service on your local development machine to a public internet URL without messing with DNS and firewall settings. Similar to Ngrok. In addition to the free hosted version, it is also [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).

item.title: add localtunnel - publicly expose local web server
item.description: https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel - Easily share a web service on your local development machine to a public internet URL without messing with DNS and firewall settings. Similar to Ngrok. In addition to the free hosted version, it is also [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).

item.title: add carbon.now.sh - share code snippet as image
item.description: https://carbon.now.sh - create and share code snippet in an aesthetic screenshot-like image format. Usually used to aesthetically share/show-off code snippet on Twitter or blog posts.

item.title: Fix Tailscale description
item.description: https://tailscale.com/ - Zero config VPN, using the open source WireGuard protocol. Installs on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android devices. Free plan for personal use with 20 devices.

item.title: Add Tailscale
item.description: https://tailscale.com/ - Zero config VPN. Installs on any device, manages firewall rules. Run on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android. Free plan for personal use with 20 devices.
